CommandDefinition.Name: showcodeaccessstatus
CommandDefinition.Description: Show the current status of a code access instance.

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace managed by the code access instance

BoolOption.Name: v
BoolOption.Description: Shows the exception for every build error

BoolOption.Name: r
BoolOption.Description: Adds informations from the associated repository access instance
